docs.snippet: The head of the St. Andrew's Society of New Hampshire said his heart wanted to see Scottish voters choose independence Thursday, but his head knew remaining in the United Kingdom was the wiser choice....

headline.main: At Highland Games, Revelers Split on Scottish Vote
headline.print_headline: At Highland Games, Revelers Split on Scottish Vote

docs.lead_paragraph: The head of the St. Andrew's Society of New Hampshire said his heart wanted to see Scottish voters choose independence Thursday, but his head knew remaining in the United Kingdom was the wiser choice.

docs.snippet: Greece's finance minister said Friday that his country will not seek additional rescue funds from other eurozone countries after bailout loans are completed this year, despite concerns from rescue lenders that an early general election could unrav...

headline.main: Greece: New Bailout 'Out of the Question'
headline.print_headline: Greece: New Bailout 'Out of the Question'

docs.lead_paragraph: Greece's finance minister said Friday that his country will not seek additional rescue funds from other eurozone countries after bailout loans are completed this year, despite concerns from rescue lenders that an early general election could unravel years of painful cost-cutting reforms.
